scripts.start: if [ -d "server" ]; then npm run build && npm run server:start; else echo '⚠️ WARNING: server/ directory is missing'; exit 1; fi
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.install: if [ -d "server" ]; then npm install --prefix server; else echo '⚠️ WARNING: server/ directory is missing'; exit 1; fi && if [ -d "client" ]; then npm install --prefix client; fi
scripts.client:build: if [ -d "client" ]; then npm run build --prefix client; fi
scripts.client:dev: if [ -d "client" ]; then npm run dev --prefix client; fi
scripts.build: if [ -d "server" ]; then npm run build --prefix server; else echo '⚠️ WARNING: server/ directory is missing'; exit 1; fi && if [ -d "client" ]; then npm run build --prefix client; fi
scripts.seed: if [ -d "server" ]; then npm run seed --prefix server; fi
